select sur_seq.currval as sur_seq from dual
insert into tb_06_rs(sur_seq, SUR_TITLE, QUE_CNT, SUR_SAT_DATE, SUR_END_DATE, WRITER, REG_NAME, REG_DATE ,UDT_NAME, UDT_DATE) values(sur_seq.nextval, #{sur_title}, ${que_cnt}, #{sur_sat_date}, #{sur_end_date}, #{writer}, #{reg_name}, sysdate, #{udt_name}, sysdate)

select surq_seq.currval as surq_seq from dual
insert into tb_06_rsq(SURQ_SEQ, SUR_SEQ, SURQ_TITLE, WRITER, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, UDT_NAME, UDT_DATE) values(surq_seq.nextval, ${sur_seq}, #{surq_title}, #{writer}, #{reg_name}, sysdate, #{udt_name}, sysdate)

insert into tb_06_rsi(SURI_SEQ, SUR_SEQ, SURQ_SEQ, SURI_TITLE1, SURI_TITLE2, SURI_TITLE3, SURI_TITLE4, SURI_TITLE5, SURI_REASON, WRITER, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, UDT_NAME, UDT_DATE) values(suri_seq.nextval, ${sur_seq}, ${surq_seq}, #{suri_title1}, #{suri_title2}, #{suri_title3}, #{suri_title4}, #{suri_title5}, #{suri_reason}, #{writer}, #{reg_name}, sysdate, #{udt_name}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select * from (select sur_seq, sur_title, sur_sat_date, sur_end_date from tb_06_rs order by sur_seq desc) ) where rownum <= 5 order by sur_seq asc) where rownum <= 5 order by sur_seq desc
